thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com | 5 of 77
thread.title: Abel
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Abel

author: Abel
title: Abel
text:
The store is extremely discreet since you don't have to register on their website place an order, just place it and that's it. They will ship the product the very next day you place the order regardless of the shipping method you've chosen!
The freebies are top of the line as well: a four-piece metallic grinder with an included loading tool for kief and a vacuum sealed black plastic container is what you'll get of them.
Since I live overseas, I had to use a freight forwarder; regardless, they did not have an issue with that making them my #1 choice for future purchases!
